traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.description: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a СЛ 14 Constitution спасбросок. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature’s greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

actions.name: Мультиатака
actions.description: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Попадание: 12 (2d6 + 5) дробящего урона. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a СЛ 14 Constitution спасбросок or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature’s skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can’t regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-­‐curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft. one target. Попадание: 15 (3d6 + 5) дробящего урона. Enslave (3/Day). The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a СЛ 14 Wisdom спасбросок or be magically charmed by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The charmed target is under the aboleth’s control and can’t take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the спасбросок. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the спасбросок when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.description: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Swipe
legendary_actions.description: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

The deva touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 (4d8 + 2) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva’s choice). In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a бонусное действие to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar’s hands. legendary_actions.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a СЛ 15 Constitution спасбросок or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness. Animated Objects

traits.name: False Appearance

actions.name: Smother
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Попадание: The creature is grappled (escape СЛ 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can’t smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target’s turns, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) дробящего урона.

actions.name: Укус

If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape СЛ 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has преимущество on attack rolls to do so.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.description: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a СЛ 12 Constitution спасбросок if the basilisk isn’t incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the спасбросок at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. A creature that isn’t surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the спасбросок at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can’t see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save. If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

actions.name: Swallow

actions.name: Medium or smaller target it is grappling
actions.description: If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir’s turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time. If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a СЛ 14 Constitution спасбросок at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.description: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn’t an aberration must succeed on a СЛ 13 Wisdom спасбросок or become frightened until the end of the cloaker’s next turn. If a creature’s спасбросок is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker’s moan for the next 24 hours Phantasms (Перезарядкаs after a Short or Long Rest). The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn’t in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear. Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can’t see or if it relies on senses other than sight. A duplicate has the cloaker’s AC and uses its спасбросокs. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a спасбросок against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.description: The darkmantle can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

actions.name: Crush
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Попадание: 6 (1d6 + 3) дробящего урона, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is Medium or smaller and the darkmantle has преимущество on the attack roll, it attaches by engulfing the target’s head, and the target is also blinded and unable to breathe while the darkmantle is attached in this way. While attached to the target, the darkmantle can attack no other creature except the target but has преимущество on its attack rolls. The darkmantle’s speed also becomes 0, it can’t benefit from any bonus to its speed, and it moves with the target. A creature can detach the darkmantle by making a successful СЛ 13 Strength check as an action. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself from the target by using 5 feet of movement. Darkness Aura (1/Day). A 15-­‐foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). Darkvision can’t penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. actions.name: Мультиатака
actions.description: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can’t make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Укус
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Попадание: 33 (4d12 + 7) колющего урона. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape СЛ 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can’t bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Попадание: 20 (3d8 + 7) дробящего урона.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.description: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has преимущество on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Мультиатака
actions.description: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Попадание: 7 (1d6 + 4) дробящего урона.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.description: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger’s concentration isn’t broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target’s mind, the doppelganger has преимущество on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target. Dragons, Chromatic Black Dragon

actions.name: Tail

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.description: Each creature of the dragon’s choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a СЛ 19 Wisdom спасбросок or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the спасбросок at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s спасбросок is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours. Acid Breath (Перезарядка 5–6). The dragon exhales acid in a 90-­‐foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a СЛ 22 Dexterity спасбросок, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The mummy lord has the following cleric spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy 1st level (4 slots): command, guiding bolt, shield of faith 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, silence, spiritual weapon 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, dispel magic 4th level (3 slots): divination, guardian of faith 5th level (2 slots): contagion, insect plague 6th level (1 slot): harm

actions.name: Мультиатака
actions.description: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one attack with its rotting fist.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a СЛ 16 Constitution спасбросок or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can’t regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target’s hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a СЛ 16 Wisdom спасбросок against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy’s next turn. If the target fails the спасбросок by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the спасбросок is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.description: The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.

legendary_actions.name: Blinding Dust
legendary_actions.description: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a СЛ 16 Constitution спасбросок or be blinded until the end of the creature’s next turn. 334 System Reference Document 5.1

legendary_actions.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-­‐undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a СЛ 16 Constitution спасбросок or be stunned until the end of the mummy lord’s next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can’t regain hit points until the end of the mummy lord’s next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.description: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can’t be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession. Monsters (N) Nagas

If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-­‐inch-­‐thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding’s, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

traits.name: Ooze Cube
traits.description: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube’s Engulf and has disпреимущество on the спасбросок. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an 337 System Reference Document 5.1 action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful СЛ 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage. The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

Whenever the cube enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a СЛ 12 Dexterity спасбросок. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed спасбросок. On a failed save, the cube enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cube’s turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a СЛ 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies. While in mist form, the vampire can’t take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature’s space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can’t pass through water. actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: Атака оружием ближнего боя: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Попадание: 7 (1d6 + 4) колющего урона plus 10 (3d6) некротического урона. The target’s hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the некротического урона taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire’s control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a СЛ 17 Wisdom спасбросок against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn’t under the vampire’s control, it takes the vampire’s requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire’s bite attack. Each time the vampire or the vampire’s companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the спасбросок, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a бонусное действие to end the effect. Children of the Night (1/Day). The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats or rats, provided that the sun isn’t up. While outdoors, the vampire can call 3d6 wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a бонусное действие.
